text.lilligant.portal.too_high: Portal is too high to form
text.lilligant.portal.too_low: Portal is too low to form
lilligant.pebkac.title: Stop messing with your JVM args
lilligant.pebkac.message: Bad JVM arguments detected. Stop changing your JVM args. You don't know what you're doing. I won't tell you which ones because you'll just remove them but keep all the rest of the terrible args.
lilligant.pebkac.confirm: I will delete my custom arguments
